metadata.title: CVE-2024-24266 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: gpac v2.2.1 was discovered to contain a Use-After-Free (UAF) vulnerabilityvia the dasher_configure_pid function at /src/filters/dasher.c.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
